detaileddescription.para: The offload data struct is very simple and contains only the necessary fields which are all initialized when the data is read (except B_GS.offload_array_length). The offload array is not required at all. Therefore, this function only sets the offload_array_length to zero, assigns a NULL pointer to offload_array, and prints sanity checks so that user may verify that data was initialized succesfully.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to pointer to offload array
